content: Why change from "Big Ears" when it's so fitting? Brothers can be so hard to understand sometimes, turning it into something unmemorable like Kurt.

Before leaving the Station, I need to see <color=#599d63>Big Ears</color>... oh no, I mean my brother... I mean Station Master <color=#599d63>Kurt</color> to register for my <color=#4cb4b0>Resident ID Card</color> for Bamboozle Valley. Then I'll officially be a resident!
